hints.label: thm-alpha-net-explicit
hints.title: Mean-Field Convergence Rate (Explicit)
hints.content:
4450: :label: thm-alpha-net-explicit
4451: 
4452: The mean-field convergence rate as a function of simulation parameters is:
4453: 
4454: $$
4455: \begin{aligned}
4456: \alpha_{\text{net}}(\tau, \gamma, \sigma, \lambda_{\text{revive}}, \kappa_{\max}, L_U) \approx \frac{1}{2} \Bigg[
4457: &\frac{\gamma \sigma^2}{1 + \gamma/\lambda_{\min} + \lambda_{\text{revive}}/(M_\infty \gamma)} \\
4458: &- \frac{2\gamma}{\sigma^2} \left(\sqrt{\frac{\kappa_{\max}}{\sigma^2}} + \sqrt{\frac{L_U}{\gamma}} + \gamma\right) \sigma\tau\sqrt{2d} \\
4459: &- \frac{2\gamma L_U^3}{\sigma^4(1 + \gamma/\lambda_{\min})} \\
4460: &- (C_{\nabla x} + \gamma) \sqrt{2d\sigma^2/\gamma} \\
4461: &- 2\kappa_{\max} - \frac{\kappa_0(\lambda_{\text{revive}} + \kappa_0)^2}{\lambda_{\text{revive}}^2}
4462: \Bigg]
4463: \end{aligned}

hints.label: thm-optimal-parameter-scaling
hints.title: Optimal Parameter Scaling
hints.content:
4534: :label: thm-optimal-parameter-scaling
4535: 
4536: For a landscape with Lipschitz constant $L_U$ and minimum Hessian eigenvalue $\lambda_{\min}$, the optimal parameter scaling is:
4537: 
4538: $$
4539: \begin{aligned}
4540: \gamma^* &\sim L_U^{3/7} \\
4541: \sigma^* &\sim L_U^{9/14} \\
4542: \tau^* &\sim L_U^{-12/7} \\
4543: \lambda_{\text{revive}}^* &\sim \kappa_{\max}
4544: \end{aligned}
4545: $$
4546: 
4547: yielding convergence rate:
4548: 
4549: $$
4550: \alpha_{\text{net}}^* \sim \gamma^* \sim L_U^{3/7}
hints.raw_directive:
4531: This balances killing and revival, minimizing the dead/alive ratio fluctuations.
